events.message: I just got into a car accident this morning. My vehicle was hit at the intersection, and I need to file a claim immediately.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the details of the collision and vehicle damage.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist you through the claim process regarding the car accident.
We acknowledge receipt of your accident claim and assure you that our team is working to resolve the issue quickly.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of your driver's license to proceed with the evaluation.
The requested documents including police report and car photos have been uploaded successfully for review.
Our investigation team has started reviewing the claim details and submitted documents to assess the damages and liability.
The investigation into the vehicle collision is complete, and the findings are now ready for the next step in the claim process.
We have proposed a settlement amount based on assessed damages and repair estimates to cover your vehicle repairs.
The customer has responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the proposed resolution.
The claim has been officially approved and we are preparing to issue payment for the vehicle repairs as agreed.
The payment to cover repair costs has been successfully issued and should reflect in your account within a few business days.
Your auto accident claim has been closed following the payment issuance and successful resolution of the case.
